section.text: *NOTE: This section was added by emergency legislation that will expire on October 22, 2021.*
section.heading: Existing moratorium under § 34-1506.01
section.text: Nothing in this act (Law 24-9) shall be read to supersede the existing moratorium on disconnections under § 34-1506.01.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 3(k) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-125, July 24, 2021, 68 DCR 007342).
